xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 19 June 2013
xwikidoc.content: <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 08:21 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 09:51 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 10:19 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 13:01 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 13:36 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 13:40 <bvancea> hello, sdumitriu 14:03 <sdumitriu1> Hey bvancea 14:04 <bvancea> how are you? 14:04 <sdumitriu1> Meetings 14:04 <sdumitriu1> I'll probably go back in a few minutes 14:04 <bvancea> okay, I'll be short then 14:04 <bvancea> I've started refactoring my code for indexing 14:05 <bvancea> its still solrj, I'm just trying to use as few memory as possbile 14:05 <bvancea> btw, do we have an hour set for tomorrow? 14:09 <sdumitriu1> Not yet 14:09 <sdumitriu1> Can you send an email to me and Brian proposing one? 14:09 <sdumitriu1> I'm basically free, but I don't know Brian's schedule 14:10 <bvancea> I noticed he said in an email 14:10 <bvancea> he'd be willing for 1-4 pm 14:10 <bvancea> is that toronto time? 14:10 <sdumitriu1> Ah, OK 14:10 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:10 <bvancea> I'm gonna check 14:10 <bvancea> if that's right 14:10 <sdumitriu1> How was your exam? 14:10 <bvancea> if it is, I'm going to propose the same hour 14:10 <bvancea> pretty good 14:10 <bvancea> :D 14:11 <bvancea> so happy I'm done with them 14:11 <bvancea> hmm, it was mark who said 1-4 pm toronto time 14:15 <bvancea> ok, so I kept that interval 14:16 <bvancea> damn, I put the wrong day 14:19 <sdumitriu1> Looks like I'm not needed for the rest of the meeting 14:20 <bvancea> haha 14:20 <bvancea> nice 14:21 <bvancea> I'll go afk for 10-15 minutes 14:55 <bvancea> so, how was the xwiki release? 14:55 <bvancea> you realeased the new version this week? 15:00 <sdumitriu1> Not me, but yes 15:01 <sdumitriu1> We have a lot of releasers: http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/ReleaseManagerRoster#HReleaseStatistics 15:01 <bvancea> hehe 15:01 <bvancea> nice
